title: In the Line of Fire: A Memoir
description: In a memoir by the president of a nation at the center of a hotbed of radical Islamic extremists and the war against terror, Pakistan's leader offers a candid account of his life and political career, offering revealing details about his rise to power, the perils he has faced, the hunt for bin Laden and other Al Qaeda terrorists, the struggle with India, and other key issues. 75,000 first printing.
author: Pervez Musharraf
